name: Conquest (itch)
description:
A short game about the victims of space exploration.

WASD or Arrows to move

E to examine

Esc to quit

Conquest is our first game. There are many more to come. Feel free to send us any commentary or criticism at outlands.games@gmail.com

by OUTLANDS.

http://outlands-games.com/

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/OutlandsGames

and Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OutlandsGames

Music by BURAI
